meta_description: Woodmere Art Museum tells the story of Philadelphia’s art and artists through a broad range of exhibitions, music events, classes, lectures, and programs.
hours_text:
# Visit

Plan Your Visit

Admission can be purchased [online here](https://woodmere.ticketapp.org/portal/pages/visit) or at the front desk.

##### **MUSEUM HOURS**

Wednesday | 10 am – 5 pm  
---|---  
Thursday |  10 am – 5 pm  
Friday |  10 am – 5 pm  
Saturday |  10 am – 5 pm  
Sunday |  10 am – 5 pm  
  
The museum grounds are open dawn to dusk Monday - Sunday.

#### **Admission**

**Please note the small increase in admission prices, as of November 5, 2025. This includes entrance to both Smith Hall and Maguire Hall.**

Adults | $15  
---|---  
Seniors (55+) | $10  
Children and Students (with ID) | Free  
[Museum Members](https://woodmereartmuseum.org/join) | **Free**  
  
Woodmere Art Museum is closed on the following holidays: 

  * New Year's Day
  * Easter
  * July 4th
  * Thanksgiving
  * Christmas Day 

We will close early at 2pm on the following days:

  * Christmas Eve
  * New Year's Eve

**Click[here](https://guides.bloombergconnects.org/en-US/guide/woodmereArtMuseum) to visit Woodmere on Bloomberg Connects FREE digital guide from anywhere worldwide, 24 hours a day, 365 days a year​!**

* * *

#### **Specials and Discounts**

  * **Woodmere offers FREE Admission on Sundays** (does not include events) 
    * Free Sundays are sponsored in part by the generous support of the Clarence Rowell Trust.
  * **We’re Proud to Be a Blue Star Museum:******  
Free admission for active-duty military and their families  
Memorial Day through Labor Day we offer free admission for...
